feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and quotation marks appropriately.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, and text and discourse features, along with the absence of spelling errors, there is moderate confidence that the texts were written by the same author.
